title: Regen Ledger v5.1 Upgrade
description:
This is a software upgrade proposal for the upgrade to Regen Ledger v5.1. If passed, this proposal would commit Regen Mainnet to halting the application binary for Regen Ledger v5.0 at approximately 15:00 UTC on March 28th at block height 10068550 and requiring nodes to restart with the application binary using Regen Ledger v5.1. 

More details can be found in the long form proposal: https://github.com/regen-network/governance/tree/main/proposals/2023-03-regen-ledger-v5.1-upgrade
